title: When you have a bad day

replies.body: What kind of mechanics do I master to reach that tier?

First you need to play Yasuo. Then you need to die as much as possibly then blame your teammates, but this performance will lead you only to Bronze V. To reach this secret tier you have to build full AP on him.
AP Tank Tristana goes a long way too. AP Tank Tristana is the hidden OP of ELO dropping.
Dude I've seen this more times than I want to admit it's so ridiculous lol.
RIP AP Yasuo, lost his only scaling ability

> [{quoted}](name=SonicMaster02,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=d3LTZjTR,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-01-28T12:23:43.084+0000)
>
> First you need to play Yasuo. Then you need to die as much as possibly then blame your teammates, but this performance will lead you only to Bronze V. To reach this secret tier you have to build full AP on him.

Or better yet play full AD Ziggs and lose first tower to a Vi ... who's Top Lane. 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Okay I'll let you know the feedback from my teammates later.
The fact that you skip Tiers I - IV means it's similar to how Elite the Apex tiers are. You must truly be the worst of the worst to reach this.
Promoted, don't you mean demoted?
It's so special you get promoted to it.

Anyways, i have started playing singed,

Going the ward tp lvl 1 technique, giving 1st blood to my enemies, doing it until i get to like lvl 11. then i ward their fountain, and tp to it again until i lose/win

is that enough to get to wood? or at least plastic?

Trust me, you dont want to go to plastic.

I am Plastic.

It's hell.

My hell
You need to spam your mastery emote (if you have) and build ad.
why not full boots? isn't that better? and disabling Q too.
All boots kind of worked when you had the boot enchants. I did some amazing all boots garen back in season 5.
No, that's just feeding, you need a consistent build.

Butt weight! i can buy 6 {{item:1006}} !

Green singed OpieOp {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
The sad thing is, I am sure there are people who would be in wood V if it existed.
I deserve wood V but my teams are holding me back in paper bag V. It's not fair that (insert random uneducated complaint), gg Rito.
I deserve Paper Bag V, but my team mates are holding me back in Tinfoil V.
Fertilizer? That sounds shitty
At least it's better than air lV
https://cdn.meme.am/cache/instances/folder778/500x/75132778.jpg
Git gud, I'm dirt 5... I don't play ranked is what I'm saying.
If you are dirt 5, then i am toilet 9

Sigh! one day i will get bronze 5.

One day people will know the true power of full AD Galio.

Wish me luck.

{{champion:238}} ap max w first and spam the shadows to try to scare your opponent and win lane

GGEZ works 99/100 times confirmed

I'm in challenjour 20.
Do you spam taunt and/or laugh? If you don't then there are no doubts you're not in challenjour 15

> [{quoted}](name=SonicMaster02,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=d3LTZjTR,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2017-01-30T13:11:58.901+0000)
>
> Do you spam taunt and/or laugh? If you don't then there are no doubts you're not in challenjour 15

you gotta spam EVERYTHING bro- and huck a shadow down 1st before you do it
this post encouraged me to get a muffin!

That's bullshit. The game doesn't tell you to uninstall until you hit cardboard 12.

~~I know because of a friend don't you dare judge me~~
But my full tank jax adc was working so well :(

Still a promotion
I will take it
Meh, still superior to my Balsa Wood 5.
On the contrary I love balsa wood as it is the wood used to make one of the best and most influential fishing lures ever.
Fair enough.

>When you had a bad day.

And you make it worse by listening to the Bad Day song.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gH476CxJxfg

Ya know, when someone rages nonstop in a game, I should just start reciting these lyrics in chat until they shutup.
Im actually Plastic bin V -99 Elo =/ Feelsbadman.
Maybe you should say demoted but it was great anyways ;)
